1.title: Dick Vitale All Access
1.plot: ESPNU cameras follow the basketball Hall of Famer Dick Vitale in Sarasota where he lives, in addition to a typical college basketball workweek calling the NC State at North Carolina game on January 26 and two days later announcing the St. John's at Duke game alongside Brent Musburger.

imdb.plot outline: You can own some of the most memorable sporting events almost instantly. The best games, matches, and races that become ESPN Instant Classics are now available for you to watch over and over again. Keep your TV on ESPN and check back here often for new additions.
imdb.title: ESPN Instant Classics
plot: You can own some of the most memorable sporting events almost instantly. The best games, matches, and races that become _ESPN Instant Classics_ (qv) are now available for you to watch over and over again. Keep your TV on ESPN and check back here often for new additions.
